about_the_game:
Aspect Heroes is a turn-based strategy game with a rich fantasy narrative and a new unique mixture of battle mechanics. Roguelike skill trees and battle progression, procedurally spawning enemies, and a huge cast of both enemies and heroes keep battles fresh and replayable.









Notch, the Hunter. Pila, the Legionary. Feurie, the Firemage. Draco, the Flameknight. John, the Smith. Lucian, the Jester[. Tera, the Treespeaker. Lachesis, the Harvester. Vix, the Bloodmage. Blaidd, the Veteran. Unlock more hidden heroes through achievements!





The entire storyline is told from ten different Heroes' perspectives in Story Mode. Uncover secret plots, selfless acts, heartbreaking truths, and bittersweet justice. Will the once peaceful land of Caestice ever be the same?

Explore 9 hand painted, beautiful environments each with their own twist on the battle mechanics. All the authored scripts are professionally voice acted in a way that brings the story to life as you progress.





As you clear each procedural wave of oncoming enemies, choose from stats, summoned allies, or game-changing skill tree options in a roguelike experience. No two battles will be the same! Plan, survive, adapt.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IGP or better - 2GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: In this turn-based tactical strategy game, you will battle against endless waves of diverse enemies, earning rewards with each victory. Uncover the secrets of the animalistic Aspects, craft gear to enhance your strength, and challenge yourself in the infinite mode for endless rewards.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
